participant_id.Description: Unique BIDS identifier for the participant in this study.

bal_test1_result_y.Description: Breathalyzer Test 1 Result: | 3=Not applicable (not randomized) ; 1=Negative (.000) ; 2=Positive (.001 or above) ; 4=Participant unable to complete (tried 3 times) ; 5=Participant refused ; 7=Not collected - remote completion ; 8=Institution not authorized to collect samples due to COVID ; 9=Staff discomfort due to COVID ; 10=Exceed 15min of < 6ft distance from youth (COVID) ; 11=Not approved by ABCD for collection ; 6=Not collected (other)

Levels.8: Institution not authorized to collect samples due to COVID
Levels.11: Not approved by ABCD for collection

bal_test2_result_y.Description: Breathalyzer Test 2 Result: | 1 = Negative (.000); 2 = Positive (.001 or above); 4 = Participant unable to complete (tried 3 times); 5 = Participant refused; 6 = Not collected (other)

bal2_need.Description: Is BAL Test Day 2 needed for this participant? | 1 = Yes; 0 = No

bal2_test1_result_y.Description: Breathalyzer Test 1 Day 2 Result: | 1 = Negative (.000); 2 = Positive (.001 or above); 4 = Participant unable to complete (tried 3 times); 5 = Participant refused; 6 = Not collected (other)

bal2_test2_result_y.Description: Breathalyzer Test 2 Day 2 Result: | 1 = Negative (.000); 2 = Positive (.001 or above); 4 = Participant unable to complete (tried 3 times); 5 = Participant refused; 6 = Not collected (other)
